    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadProtocol

        public ThreadProtocol(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<FullMessage<P>>> blockingQueues,
                      java.lang.String me)
        Creates a new ThreadProtocol resource for a certain address, given as any String, and a channel simulated by a BlockingQueue map.
        Parameters:
        blockingQueues - the mapping between addresses and BlockingQueue "inboxes".
        me - the address to which the object created responds to (i.e., the local address). It can be any String.

      • ThreadProtocol

        public ThreadProtocol(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<FullMessage<P>>> blockingQueues)
        Creates a new ThreadProtocol resource for a channel simulated by a BlockingQueue map. The local address is set to the name of the Thread in which the object was instantiated.
        Parameters:
        blockingQueues - the mapping between addresses and BlockingQueue "inboxes".
